SpellChargeTime.Description: The time it takes to charge the spell, to then be able to activate it.

Cooldown_ChargeThresholdInSeconds.Description: The threshold in seconds for the charge to reach for any cooldown to be triggered. (to prevent punishing players when tapping the ability button)

Cooldown_IntroCooldown.Description: The cooldown that is applied at the start of the match, after the intro sequence is completed

Cooldown_ActivatedSpell.Description: The cooldown that is applied on the spell if the spell is cast.

Cooldown_CancelledSpell.Description: The cooldown that is applied on the spell if the spell was cancelled (i.e. charge has been started but spell was not confirmed to be cast)

ExitInteractionTime_AcivatedSpell.Description: The time it takes to exit the interaction when the spell is cast.

ExitInteractionTime_CancelledSpell.Description: The time it takes to exit the interaction when the spell is cancelled (not cast).

Pallet_SurvivorHighlightMaxDistance.Description: The maximum distance a pallet needs to be from a pallet to see it glow from the mage hand power

Pallet_State_WaitTimeBeforeBlockingUpPal.Description: The time that the mage hand will be waiting before blocking a pallet that is currently in an Up state.

Pallet_State_DefaultPalletBlockDuration.Description: The default pallet block duration (if blocking pallet after it was left in the Up state)

Pallet_State_WaitTimeBeforeLiftingPallet.Description: The time that the mage hand waits before lifting a pallet up after being in the fallen state.

Pallet_State_BlockDurationAfterLiftingPa.Description: The duration of the pallet block after the pallet has been lifted by the mage hand

Pallet_State_PalletLiftDuration.Description: The time it takes for the mage hand to fully lift the target pallet

Pallet_State_BreakPalletAnimationDuratio.Description: The amound of time (in seconds) it take for the mage hand to completely break the pallet

Counter_HasteEffectDuration.Description: The duration of the haste effect for survivors holding items countering the mage hand spell when it is activated by the killer.

Counter_HasteEffectMovementPercentageInc.Description: The movement percentage increase of the haste effect.

Counter_RevealKillerDuration.Description: The time the killer is revealed to the survivor when mage hand is activated by the killer.

Addon_03_AddedBlockingUpPalletTime.Description: The amount of time (in seconds) that will be added to the blocking up pallet duration

Addon_07_VaultSpeedIncreaseDurationMulti.Description: The modifier value that will be multiplied to the default lift time of the pallet.

Addon_07_VaultSpeedIncreaseDuration.Description: The time for which the killer is able to vault faster after casting mage hand on an up pallet.

Addon_12_HasteEffectLifetime.Description: The dunration (in seconds) of the haste effect once the mage hand is triggered

Addon_12_HasteEffectPercentageAdditiveVa.Description: The movement percentage additive value for the haste effect

ScoreEvent_NumberOfActivationTimesBefore.Description: The amount of times that mage hand can be activated before giving a reduced amount of bloodpoints.

ScoreEvent_ReducedScoreEventPercentage.Description: The reduced bloodpoint percentage given to the activate mage hand score event if triggered too many times
